case.title: Looking for a mature playmate - 50 (You host in Manhattan)
case.text: Are you 45+, in decent shape and have an itch that needs frequent scratching? My 60 minute oral workout is guaranteed to release all that tension between your legs. I'll come over as often as necessary and work on any part of your body that requires attention. Full service oral, front to back, top to bottom. When I'm done the tension will be gone and you'll feel great. Available weekday afternoons at your place in Manhattan. Early mornings are also possible. Professional mwm looking for a long term lover.
